posts.post_content:
I have the following raw T-205 HOFers for sale:

Mordecai Brown - $80
Fred Clarke - $45
Eddie Collins (Closed Mouth) - SOLD
Jimmy Collins - SOLD
Hugh Duffy - $75
Christy Mathewson - $115
Joe Tinker - $85
Bobby Wallace (No Cap, Two Lines 1910 Stats) - $350
Ed Walsh - $150

All prices include postage and handling.  Accepted forms of payment are personal check, money order and Paypal (gift option only).  Scans can be found at the link bellow:

[url]http://s437.photobucket.com/albums/qq91/OriginalTrekkerMike/T-205%20Hall%20of%20Famers/[/url]

AND NOW FOR THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THIS OFFER:

1) Before I sell these cards individually, I want to try to sell them as a lot first.  If I do not sell these cards as a lot within 48 hours from the time that this is posted, I will then sell them individually. NO LONGER APPLIES

2) Claims for individual cards may be made within the 48 hour window by saying "I'll take it!" via email or PM ONLY.  Once a card is claimed, I will answer the email or PM indicating that the card is reserved and update the post to indicate that a card is taken.  NO LONGER APPLIES

3) Order of precedence for claims will be determined by the date/ time stamp of the email or PM.

4) I will attempt to answer all emails and PMs in a timely manner so that you are informed of whether or not a card has been sold.

Thank you for your consideration.

Hi

I will take the Eddie Collins if still available and if you do not sell as a lot. Thanks.
